about:
Who am I? 
Nobody knows, nobody cares. My name is just a blatant reference to a time when I was playing Age of Empires 3 and the name- "Marksman'' showed up. One year later, I received Minecraft for my Birthday. Without further ado, I attempted to make my username something like "Marksman." USERNAME TAKEN! It became IAMTHEMARKSMAN. 

What am I?
A specimen of Homo Sapiens with an deep dislike for team members who never defend and an appreciation for the fine arts.

I have a bad record. I have been Warned 13 times, been Kicked 12 times and have been Temporarily Banned 4 times to date. All of those times for raging against my team-mates in one way or another because most of them do not now how to defend properly.

Despite that, if I do happen to find a few loyal team-mates who appreciate building a sturdy and well-designed base, then I am in the Zone. It could be you...But it probably won't be. I don't think anybody has read my profile yet anyway.

Thank you for reading.
interests: Science, Music, Art and being Pensive.
